name: Shoot2Live!
description:
The Title Pretty Much Explains Itself - You Shoot At Falling Blocks To Keep Yourself from Dying Out! And If Worst Comes To Worst And You Run Out Of Ammo - You Cn Just Douge The Blocks Insted Until You Reload! Oh Yea And Make Sure You Dont Get Hit By One Of These blocks Because If You Do...

I Also Added An Easy Mode If You Just Want To Douge Insted Of The Funny Shooty Shooty Stuff.

Also Be Sure To Not Pause For Too Long Because If You Do Then Resume The Most Reacent Wave Of Blocks Is Gonna Go Really Fast! I Know What Causes This Bug However Im Too Lazy To Fix It :)

I Also Ran Out Of Bujet For A Banner Lol.
